article: _  is a result of the student activity survey at our school. Most students exercise three or four times  _  week. Some students exercise once  _  twice a week. Some students exercise every day.  As for  homework, most students  _  homework every day. Some students do homework more than three times.  No  students do homework once or twice a week. The result for "watch TV" is  _  . Some students watch TV once or twice a week. Some watch TV three or four  times  a week. But most students watch TV every day.  _  think it's helpful for them  to watch  TV. They can be relaxed and learn much knowledge by watching TV.
